doc:
Brad Davis (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brad_Davis_(actor) 0 Robert Creel Davis (November 6, 1949 – September 8, 1991), known professionally as Brad Davis, was an American actor, known for starring in the 1978 film Midnight Express and 1982 film Querelle. Robert_Creel_Davis ( November_6_,_1949 – September_8_,_1991 ) , known professionally as Brad_Davis , was an_American_actor , known for starring in the_1978_film_Midnight_Express and 1982_film_Querelle .
